lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because:
I believe one person can make a difference.

If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.  ~Mother Teresa
lenders.occupational_info: Manage operations and staff in a medical office.

lenders.name: rhea
lenders.loan_because: i love to see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: i work on web sites.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance. Very few people are accumulating the majority of the wealth in the world; redirecting this wealth- one loan at a time- is doing my part to counteract this phenomenon. It makes me feel good to know I'm doing my part to redistribute wealth to people who truly need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in South Korea.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I've been given so many opportunities, and I want to give some to others.

lenders.name: Jackets
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky in what I have and I would like to share and encourage others to share as well!   What a great way to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I provide intellectual property (patent, trademark and copyright) protection for clients.

lenders.name: Hilton Sisters
lenders.loan_because: My sisters and I thought this would be a great way to celebrate the holidays.

lenders.name: Skye Lucking
lenders.loan_because: I was going to put this money into a collage savings account for my nephews, but decided to cycle it through Kiva first. I want to help make the planet a better place for them, and every one else!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Maria José
lenders.loan_because: it may make a difference

lenders.name: eileen
lenders.occupation: nurse working with preterm and sick babies

lenders.name: Claudya
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to succeed and thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: My passion is acting and I feel blessed whenever I get paid to perform. The rest of the time I do whatever it takes to pay the bills including working in a museum, being a personal assistant, and translation work.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I can and I admire what these people create with so little
lenders.occupational_info: currently unemployed

lenders.name: Megan Fitzgerald
lenders.occupation: Expat Career and Personal Branding Coach
lenders.loan_because: There are millions of entrepreneurs out there with fantastic vision, passion and purpose who just need a little support to help them build the business that is going to support their family and their community. Supporting economic growth around the world serves all of us - with just a small loan anyone can have incredible impact in someone else's life - and an impact on the world's economic development as a result.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help expats committed to their own growth and success be more visible, sought after and land work abroad. Having built a portable career that supports my choice of global living, I use my 19+ years experience in professional and business development in 40+ countries and a creative, in depth and online-centered approach to help others do the same. 

To learn more visit my website (below) or my blog:  www.careerbychoiceblog.com.

Thanks for the visit. It's great to be a part of this community. If we all do our part I believe the world will be a better place because of it.

lenders.name: Ryan&Crystal
lenders.loan_because: first, out of God's love for us, we love Him back. Then out of that, flows a love and servanthood toward all of His people as Jesus demonstrated perfectly.
lenders.occupational_info:
Crystal is a pre-kindergarten teacher who works with 4 year olds.
Ryan works in a Christ-centered church with children ages 10 to 18. He develops programs, organizes events, builds relationships, and teaches lessons in order to draw teenages closer to Jesus, His Salvation, and His message of community.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: God always takes care of my needs and I feel it is my turn now to  help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a computer professional and am retired now.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a break. I am particularly keen on helping women in the developing world because I am a great believer in the power of women to change the world. I lived in Asia for 12 years, and while I have seen some terrible poverty, I have also met some wonderful people who work really hard to make their lives and the lives of their communities better.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an advertising agency with my husband. We advertise products and services for a number of local, national and international clients

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I HOPE TO HELP IMPROVE CONDITIONS AROUND THE WORLD
lenders.occupational_info:
RETIRED FROM FINANCIAL SERVICES NOW FINANCIAL LITERACY VOLUNTEER OF
CENTRAL TEXAS

lenders.name: Scotty
lenders.loan_because:
If I can help people better themselves through their hard work, I am willing to help out.  

As long as someone is willing to work to make a living, and if they are willing to take a risk by taking a loan, and if a small loan will help people to make their life better, then it is worth helping those people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government to help people in their time of need.

lenders.name: Benjamin and Brandon
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other people

lenders.name: Bing & Jennie
lenders.loan_because: Our middle school Sunday School class (6, 7 & 8 grades) at First Congregational Church of Palo Alto made this loan.
lenders.occupational_info: Matching the right people and interests for a good outcome for both.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: this is an easy and effective way to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write, analyze, and test computer software

lenders.name: Shauna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that the money I put into Kiva loans keeps working to help small businesses grow. As the loans are repaid I can to use that money to assist the next entrepreneur, and the next one, and the next one.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school. I will be working with animals as a Veterinarian Tech.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.

lenders.name: Gary N.
lenders.loan_because: more prosperity equals more peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Gene
lenders.loan_because: I own a small business, and I want others to be able to enjoy the sense of living and working their own dream.
lenders.occupational_info: We assist companies around the world to make business decisions on how to grow and protect their own businesses.

lenders.name: jon
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is start your own business and become independent
lenders.occupational_info: I work in all aspects of theatre and try to help kids to develope their talents ,no matter what the talents  are.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful opportunity Kiva gives us to help those who are willing to learn and work hard to improve their lives and the lives of their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I have raised, trained, and marketed exotic and endangered animals for decades.  My five sons are all grown and I hope will follow me in the Kiva experience.

lenders.name: The Larson Family
lenders.loan_because: We teach our kids to give to those less fortunate than us & that even the smallest amount given can made a huge difference.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to help people get out of poverty, but I've never thought that just giving them money because they look like their in bad shape was a terribly wonderful idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find interesting things to read. I don't get paid because I'm not sixteen yet (the legal working age) but I get to see what working in a bookstore is like.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves.  Its more important to teach others how to fish than to give a fish, and since I can't teach how to fish, the least I can do is provide some assistance.   :)

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.loan_because: I deeply admire people who are working to make their lives better one day at a time....
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my family and my home; we try to make what we have stretch;we remake, reuse and recyle. But still, I have a lot to learn from people like Sapnah.

lenders.name: Abrilla
lenders.loan_because: It's an excellent way to help people help themselves. We all need someone to believe in us an extend resources when needed. The loan Program will  build better lives for families,  which builds a better world for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: As an insurance agent, I educate, assist, enroll and sell Life, Health, and Mortgage Insurance protections to the public at large.

lenders.name: Juan (Tony)
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Treasury department of a 113 billion dollar company

lenders.name: Vince
lenders.loan_because: We all have an obligation to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate and construction.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I've seen the valuable impact that micro lending can have on an individual's life, the lives of their children, and the community they live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit incubator and consulting firm that helps nonprofits mobilize more resources toward achieving their mission every day.

lenders.name: Jack & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We both desire to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
I make paper, write, bind books, take photos and garden.
My wife binds books, makes and designs jewlery, writes, paints, draws and much more.

lenders.name: Zoe
lenders.loan_because: People need to help each other.  We take too much for granted.

lenders.name: Carrol
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled in a number of Third World Countries, especially in SE Asia and continually marvel at the hard working people. Being able to assist some of them financially with loans is a great privilege to me. In my mind, loans which acknowledge the value of work, are far superior to the handouts tourists are often tempted to give.

lenders.name: symmetries
lenders.loan_because:
A few years ago, our daughter suggested we make a loan on behalf of her school teachers, instead of giving them Christmas gifts.
Who knew then that that first loan would continue to be a gift that keeps on giving and giving!

lenders.name: Libby
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses think strategically about their market and how to execute to make money.

lenders.name: Norah
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to be part of  the global community to help people help themself.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people with financial problems.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: For one year I'm not eating out for lunch once a week, and using that money to sponsor one $25 loan per month.  Any repayments are being put back into new micro-loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: 4/5_Students_in_Alaska
lenders.occupation: Fourth and Fifth Grade Students in Anchorage, AK
lenders.loan_because: Because we want to change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: We go to school every day and study  reading, math, sicence, social studies...

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.occupation: a lil bit of this and that
lenders.loan_because: i believe that people when given opportunities can make something come out of themselves...be it creative, manual, useful, unuseful, pratical or silly...
lenders.occupational_info: well...don't really know how to answer that! i've been picking strawberies in denmark, assisting kids in germany, teaching in lisbon/portugal, barmaiding in porto/portugal, producing stuff, and so on...you can say i'm handy!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and should in some small way be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: To laugh often and love much; to win the respect of intelligent persons and the affection of children; to earn the approbation of honest citizens and endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty; to find the best in others; to give of one’s self; to leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to have played and laughed with enthusiasm and sung with exultation; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived—this is to have succeeded

lenders.name: John & Djohariah
lenders.loan_because: ...its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Hillary
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to hopefully make a difference and help change some else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my kids, husband and home and I'm fortunate enough to be able to spend time volunteering and not working all the time.

lenders.name: Michelle & James
lenders.loan_because: we want to help make the world a better place, and we believe that microlending is one way of doing this.

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.loan_because: it's motivating to see businesses and people succeed and being the BEST they can be !
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a dental office, cleaning teeth !

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner I understand the need for a little help sometimes. I feel its good to help others with a need
lenders.occupational_info: I custom print T-Shirts and other garments.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I'm in a positions where I have the ability to give so I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student and for work I serve food in the cafeteria here at my university, not to glamorous, but it pays my bills

lenders.name: Lorie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position to give someone a helping hand.  I am delighted to have the opportunity to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I make custom stationery, notes and greeting cards

lenders.name: Emmie
lenders.occupation: Canale Intern at Sewanee Environmental Institute
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed in the shoes I am in so I want to help others as much as I possibly can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a sophomore at Sewanee: The University of the South. It is the most magical place on earth.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: it is such a small amount and it could potentially make a big difference to someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing the best I can  at whatever I am working on at the moment!!! The more I try to do my personal best the better life becomes...

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help those who want to be successful in their lives and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a home health agency and help people, mostly elderly, in their homes with any health care needs they may have.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to better their families and have a hard time.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work anymore. I am a mother, grandmother and great-grandmother...that is work enough!

lenders.name: ALAN
lenders.loan_because: My heart breaks for these people.  I have seen the poverty first hand in my 2 trips to Tamale Ghana Africa.  Even though it's just a little, it could mean the diffence between just surviving or getting ahead
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assembly manager that monitors daily activity.  I manage over 400 people.  We build F-150 truck frames for Ford Motor Company

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: My mother asked for this instead of a Christmas present for herself. It's a wonderful way to be able to give to people and see how they prosper into successful buisness owners.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with 27 children for 7 hours a day on the basic fundamentals of education.

lenders.name: Samantha

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, majoring in Arabic-Middle Eastern Studies and minoring in International Development and Business.

lenders.name: Anna

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.occupational_info: I work for NASA helping Astronaughts live in space.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person helping one other person to change the world.

lenders.name: Ryan

lenders.occupational_info: I fix air planes.

lenders.name: Elianarus
lenders.loan_because: We want to help provide people with the opportunity to improve their lives. We are so fortunate because of the opportunities that we've had. It is incumbent upon us to provide opportunities for others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer, my wife is a nurse practitioner, and my son is Batman.

lenders.name: Gabe
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student. A cool student.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a counseling service that assists people that have a problem with alcohol and/or drugs.

lenders.name: Laura

lenders.name: David 23

It's one of many effective, direct responses to help alleviate poverty.
 Microfinance is more than just an economic movement, but a social one as well.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I feel a moral responsibility to.
lenders.occupational_info: i study to become a doctor and help the impoverished.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people's potential to achieve amazing things when they have access to resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a 25 internet company called PBworks. We help hundreds of thousands of groups work better together, including the staff at Kiva.

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: I used to be a wholesale crafts importer and I worked with many small home businesses.  I know how hard people work to make a living for their families.

lenders.name: Caesar
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I want to raise our daughters with the understanding of how important helping others really is. This is a very small thing to do that makes a huge impact.

lenders.name: tNb
lenders.loan_because: I believe.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Beth

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother to a 4 yr. old girl.  My husband and I got a late start on parenting, I was almost 43 when our daughter born.  I had worked 27 years before that as a secretary, and was ready to stop working and be a mom.

lenders.name: Resa & Craig

Resa: First Grade teacher.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Janis & Randy
lenders.loan_because: I believe God calls each of us to be responsible stewards of our blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for 25 years in a bank - in a loan department, like the Kiva lenders.  Now I sew.  I make a lot of purses, also some clothing, altar linens and other items for our church as well as a ministry that gifts these items to other churches.

lenders.name: Gayle & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in developing countries make a better life

lenders.name: Shawn

lenders.occupation: on disability insurance unable to work

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who really need help

lenders.name: Shin

lenders.name: Esteban
lenders.loan_because: I'm a closet Marxist.

lenders.name: Joe and Karena
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe there are many good and trusting people on our Earth.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: Eliminating poverty in the world is important to me. Connecting to others in this way is humbling and deeply satisfying. Making loans is right for the times. Look at the numbers. I think kiva.org is brilliant.
lenders.occupational_info: I've owned a small business for over 20 years, based on a product we invented and patented.

lenders.name: Glenda
lenders.loan_because: I am amazed at how little it takes to make such an impact on other's lives.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their position in life.  When I have been given so much, I want to share it with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I give people anesthesia for surgery, unconfortable proceedures and baby delivery in the United States.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have had a very fortunate life and feel everyone should have a chance to make a living

lenders.name: Tim and Julie
lenders.loan_because: I work with incredible people in the Philippines every day, having the ability to provide a little bit of financing to those in need is a fantastic opportunity

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: for $25 which I won't miss, I can make a big difference in someone else's life :) and that's what it's all about!

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: God has given to me, so I pass it on, that they will someday know my joy of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always been a servant/helper to anyone who passes through my life, whether it be helping young adults or my family & friends. My soul is joyful, even as age catches up with my body. 60 years old soon, I need to teach others to find this same happiness, by giving more. CBA

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to strengthen and support families all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am working with kids 12 - 18 who are criminals and have been incarcerated.  I have been going to school for 3 years at night while working full time and will become a teacher in May of 2008 at the age of 52.

lenders.name: SEpps
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to be able to.

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: I originally made a loan as a Christmas gift for my mom. Now I reloan the money because I believe that small changes can make huge differences.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: Empowering others is an extraordinary gift to be able to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Trial lawyer.

lenders.name: bettyjane
lenders.loan_because: to honor my grandparents who came to the US with nothing but hope and determination
lenders.occupational_info: to practice law as a healer of conflict

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I relate to a creative and risk-taking willingness to explore personal potential, and I support because I can.  Though I'm also a pragmatic that invests  resources into well thought-out ventures.  I find both aspects here.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: No job is done until the paperwork is finished.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
I can. I understand that even without a job (hopefully not for long) I have it so good here. I am so comfortable. Everything is so easy.
I grew up in Malawi and then in Zambia. There is absolutely no way to compare life in the US to life there.
I give because it is just something I have to do. I owe it to those amazing people who helped raise me and helped me learn to be the person I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the earth - rocks, mountains, earthquakes, volcanoes, streams, lakes, fossilized bones of older living creatures, and much more. The earth is very big, and I study what it is made of, what makes it change, and how we can live on it and make use of it.

lenders.name: Elsa
lenders.loan_because: I believe if we all do own share in helping each other, the world will become a better place to live in,

lenders.name: Lilian

lenders.name: Faren
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people's ability to empower themselves.

lenders.name: Jeffry
lenders.loan_because: I càn!
lenders.occupational_info: Long days, hard work, but really enjoyable :-)

lenders.name: DrJ

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large bakery which supplies bread, pies and pastires to markets for resale.

lenders.name: Elaina and Mair
lenders.loan_because: mum and dad are teaching us to share and we like to make other children smile.

lenders.name: Blaine
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we can all help make a difference when we come together for a common cause.

lenders.name: Gregg
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a marketing professional for a large software company

lenders.name: ged

lenders.name: Peter Aalen
lenders.loan_because: Looks  like a brilliant way to help create sustainable growth in the poorer parts of the world..
lenders.occupational_info: I study social economies at the university in Oslo and work at youth club in the "poorer" eastern part of Oslo..

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I have a concern for people and I love to see other work hard and thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest Dairy Cooperative in the United States

lenders.name: Pablo
lenders.loan_because: it's one of the many things that needs to be done.  It's fast and easy to help those in need who can and will help themselves.  It takes a bit more effort to help those who cannot help themselves and we need to help them as well.
lenders.occupational_info:

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my family many times over... there is no reason I cannot forward those blessings on to someone else in need!

lenders.name: Keegan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make even small dreams come true.

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: a loan was made available when I needed it and I would like to pass forward the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist in the planning of conferences and special events at an Ivy League college.

lenders.name: Grandma Lougheed
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in supporting people who have the ambition and ingenuity to earn their own living.  As a seamstress working with a farming family for many years, I am interested in helping others who could use a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: Grandma is 98 years old and has been a seamstress for many, many years.  She is a Canadian great, great grandmother who has lived in rural Bruce and Grey Counties, raised a family that has grown to a total of over 100 children, grandchildren, great grandchildren and great, great grandchildren.

lenders.name: Jaff
lenders.loan_because: The way to live in  the world we wish to inhabit - is to create it through our thoughts and deeds.
lenders.occupational_info: An attempt to communicate through Art.

lenders.name: rusmeeha
lenders.loan_because: Betterment is not a zero sum game. We all can live better.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because:
I believe I should give to people who have less, because that is what my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ instructs me to do.

1 Corinthians 4:7
lenders.occupational_info: retail

lenders.name: Daniel & Jen
lenders.loan_because: We love providing people a chance to succeed in their own business and lives

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who just get on with it - and if I can help support someone do that, great!
lenders.occupational_info: Maps on computers

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.occupation: Recycler and President of Heart2Heart USA
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Recycling is taking one thing - usually something that is considered garbage, like old cardboard boxes - and making it into something else.  The company I work for moves a lot of materials away from the waste stream to be recycled.

lenders.name: Ex-Pat Canadian Family
lenders.loan_because: Tikun Olam - Completing the work of creation by fixing the problems facing humanity and making the world a better place

lenders.name: Paul and Fran
lenders.loan_because: We couldn't say it better than this: "....peace is inextricably linked to poverty. Poverty is a threat to peace. . . . If I could make so many people so happy with such a tiny amount of money, why shouldn’t I do more of it?" --Muhammad Yunus, 2006 Nobel Peace Prize Winner for his pioneering program of giving microcredit loans to the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: 76 loans in 65 countries: Afghanistan, Albania, Armenia (2), Azerbaijan,  Benin, Bolivia (2), Burkino Faso, Burundi, Cameroon, Cambodia (2), Chile, Congo, Colombia, Costa Rica, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Georgia, Ghana, Guatemala (2), Haiti, Honduras, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Israel, Jordan, Kenya,  Kosovo, Kyrgyzstan, Lao PDR, Lebanon, Liberia, Malawi, Mali, Mexico, Mongolia, Mozambique, Myanmar (Burma), Nepal, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Pakistan, Palestine, Paraguay, Peru (4), Philippines (2), Rwanda, Samoa, Senegal, Sierra Leone, South Sudan, Sudan, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Timor-Leste, Togo (2), Uganda, Ukraine, United States, Viet Nam, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe

lenders.occupational_info: We help survivors of violence, families in crisis, adults re-entering the workforce or learning to read, and the children of our community.

lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to enjoy a wonderful life like mine.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I look cute .

lenders.occupational_info: Software

lenders.name: Jesper
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping the local population to start their own business, is far more effective than traditional aid, since this damages the local market of many comodities
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing, advertising, CRM, developing creditcard solutions and market analysis

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I think we should all be allowed to provide for our families
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student retraining myself for a better future.

lenders.name: Gato
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish, feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime.  I love that I can show my children that you really CAN change the world. We view this site as a family and read the stories. It's a great program.

lenders.name: Hawksview
lenders.loan_because: we've made it a great family project allowing us to be involved together in assisting others.
lenders.occupational_info: 2 Globetrotting Journalists, Homemaker, Financial Advisor, Students, living in Toronto, New York and Washington DC

lenders.name: Shushawna
lenders.occupation: fulltime student/trying to start a business

lenders.name: Michelle and Thatcher
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed. Kiva allows me to help people around the world and create a domino effect of good fortune. Each time a loan is repaid the funds then go to another person and they are essentially given a chance because someone else has succeeded before them.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I loan because sometimes just a little helps a lot.  I'd rather give someone a hand than a hand-out and KIVA is making a real difference in the world.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I can loan my lunch money to feed a less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the severely mentally and physically challanged.

lenders.name: Saul Ewing Marketing
lenders.loan_because: It's one way -- a good way --  to help people realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is a fair way for people everywhere to get and use funds. Knowing that they are going to pay us back leads to efficiency and accountability small business, which is important to any  nonprofit investor. I enjoy knowing that my small loans are having impact across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a nonprofit by asking for corporate donations and writing grants.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: At the Deerfield Community School (NH) a group of 7th & 8th graders called S.P.L.A.T. had a fundraiser to raise money for KIVA.  We raised over $100 and the students decided to loan the money to someone who supported a large family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am one of two school counselors at a small rural school for students in kindergarten through 8th grade.
